title: Perdóname (Eddy Lover song)
text: "Perdóname" () is a 2007 <a href="single%20%28music%29">single</a> by <a href="Panama">Panama</a>nian duo <a href="La%20Factor%C3%ADa">La Factoría</a> and <a href="Eddy%20Lover">Eddy Lover</a> from their third album, "<a href="Nuevas%20Metas">Nuevas Metas</a>" (2006). A remix of the song features <a href="dancehall">dancehall</a> artist Adrian Banton.
